summary: REQ-3 is partially evidenced as implemented: HomePage boxed card content in the "Our Story" section is set to black in light mode with a dark-mode override. However, due to truncation, it’s not verifiable from the diff summary that *all* primary boxed content areas on the Home page were updated, nor that no other HomePage boxed areas remain unaffected.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the Home page so the text inside the main content box section(s) renders in black (in light mode) while remaining readable in dark mode.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff snippet only clearly shows one boxed section ("Our Story") updated with `text-black dark:text-card-foreground`. Because the HomePage diff is truncated, there isn’t sufficient evidence that all main boxed content sections/cards on the Home page received the same treatment (as required by “section(s)” and the AC).
